issue.title: Move changes in docker branch to default

content.raw:
I've fixed the docker branch (update to default) and still thinking which should be the best way of getting the docker scripts into the default branch, since the docker branch is changing the boilerplate and other common script.

I agree this is important and somewhat urgent to avoid this kind of problems. I'm going to rename the issue to reflect the global problem.

Thanks Steve.
content.html:
